content.prompt: Which of the following is a differential equation that correctly describes Newton’s second law for a simple harmonic oscillator of mass m and restoring force constant k ?

choices.label: kx=m d 2 x d t 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4029@

−kx=m d 2 x d t 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4116@

−kv=m dv dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EF8@

kx=m dx dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E0F@

mg−kv=m dv dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@40D6@

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
